# Stocknear Site Navigation

## Main Pages
- `/` - Homepage
- `/about` - About Stocknear
- `/pricing` - Subscription plans
- `/contact` - Contact us
- `/support` - Support center
- `/faq` - Frequently asked questions
- `/faq/ai-agents` - AI features guide

## Stock Analysis
- `/stocks` - Stock discovery
- `/stocks/[ticker]` - Individual stock analysis (e.g., /stocks/AAPL)
- `/stocks/[ticker]/profile` - Company profile
- `/stocks/[ticker]/statistics` - Stock statistics
- `/stocks/[ticker]/financials` - Financial statements
- `/stocks/[ticker]/financials/balance-sheet` - Balance sheet
- `/stocks/[ticker]/financials/cash-flow` - Cash flow statement
- `/stocks/[ticker]/financials/ratios` - Financial ratios
- `/stocks/[ticker]/metrics` - Stock metrics
- `/stocks/[ticker]/forecast` - Stock forecast
- `/stocks/[ticker]/forecast/ai` - AI predictions
- `/stocks/[ticker]/forecast/analyst` - Analyst forecasts
- `/stocks/[ticker]/history` - Price history
- `/stocks/[ticker]/dividends` - Dividend history
- `/stocks/[ticker]/dark-pool` - Dark pool activity
- `/stocks/[ticker]/insider` - Insider trading
- `/stocks/[ticker]/insider/congress-trading` - Congressional trades
- `/stocks/[ticker]/insider/institute` - Institutional holdings
- `/stocks/[ticker]/insider/transcripts` - Earnings transcripts

## Stock Options
- `/stocks/[ticker]/options` - Options chain
- `/stocks/[ticker]/options/unusual-activity` - Unusual options
- `/stocks/[ticker]/options/hottest-contracts` - Most active contracts
- `/stocks/[ticker]/options/max-pain` - Max pain analysis
- `/stocks/[ticker]/options/gex` - Gamma exposure
- `/stocks/[ticker]/options/dex` - Delta exposure
- `/stocks/[ticker]/options/oi` - Open interest
- `/stocks/[ticker]/options/volatility` - Implied volatility
- `/stocks/[ticker]/options/contract-lookup` - Contract details

## ETF Analysis
- `/etf` - ETF screener
- `/etf/[ticker]` - ETF analysis
- `/etf/[ticker]/holdings` - ETF holdings
- `/etf/[ticker]/dividends` - ETF dividends
- `/etf/[ticker]/history` - ETF price history
- `/etf/[ticker]/dark-pool` - ETF dark pool
- `/etf/[ticker]/insider` - ETF insider activity
- `/etf/[ticker]/options` - ETF options
- `/etf/new-launches` - New ETF listings
- `/etf/etf-providers` - ETF providers list

## Index Tracking
- `/index/[ticker]` - Index analysis (e.g., /index/SPY)
- `/index/[ticker]/holdings` - Index components
- `/index/[ticker]/history` - Index history
- `/index/[ticker]/options` - Index options

## Discovery Tools
- `/stock-screener` - Advanced stock screener
- `/options-screener` - Options scanner
- `/options-flow` - Options flow tracker
- `/market-flow` - Market flow analysis
- `/dark-pool-flow` - Dark pool tracker

## Market Movers
- `/market-mover/gainers` - Top gainers
- `/market-mover/losers` - Top losers  
- `/market-mover/active` - Most active stocks
- `/market-mover/premarket/gainers` - Pre-market gainers
- `/market-mover/premarket/losers` - Pre-market losers
- `/market-mover/afterhours/gainers` - After-hours gainers
- `/market-mover/afterhours/losers` - After-hours losers

## Calendars
- `/earnings-calendar` - Earnings schedule
- `/dividends-calendar` - Dividend calendar
- `/economic-calendar` - Economic events
- `/ipos` - IPO calendar
- `/ipos/news` - IPO news
- `/ipos/statistics` - IPO statistics

## Trackers
- `/insider-tracker` - Insider trading tracker
- `/politicians` - Politicians trading
- `/politicians/flow-data` - Political trade flow
- `/potus-tracker` - Presidential portfolio
- `/reddit-tracker` - Reddit mentions

## Institutional
- `/hedge-funds` - Hedge fund holdings
- `/hedge-funds/[fund]` - Individual fund portfolio
- `/analysts` - Analyst ratings
- `/analysts/top-stocks` - Top analyst picks
- `/analysts/analyst-flow` - Rating changes

## Lists & Categories
- `/list` - Stock lists directory
- `/list/magnificent-seven` - Tech giants
- `/list/bitcoin-etfs` - Bitcoin ETFs
- `/list/ethereum-etfs` - Ethereum ETFs
- `/list/monthly-dividend-stocks` - Monthly dividend stocks
- `/list/penny-stocks` - Penny stocks
- `/list/most-shorted-stocks` - Most shorted
- `/list/overbought-stocks` - Overbought stocks
- `/list/oversold-stocks` - Oversold stocks
- `/list/dividend/[type]` - Dividend lists
- `/list/sector/[sector]` - Sector lists
- `/list/industry/[industry]` - Industry lists
- `/list/country/[country]` - Country lists

## Analysis Tools
- `/heatmap` - Market heatmap
- `/compare` - Stock comparison
- `/backtesting` - Strategy backtesting
- `/options-calculator` - Options calculator
- `/industry` - Industry overview
- `/industry/sectors` - Sector analysis

## AI & Chat
- `/chat` - AI chat assistant
- `/chat/[conversation]` - Chat conversation

## Educational
- `/learning-center` - Education hub
- `/learning-center/article/[topic]` - Educational articles
- `/blog` - Market blog
- `/blog/article/[post]` - Blog posts

## User Account
- `/login` - Login page
- `/register` - Sign up
- `/profile` - User profile
- `/profile/verification` - Account verification
- `/watchlist/stocks` - Stock watchlist
- `/watchlist/options` - Options watchlist
- `/price-alert` - Price alerts
- `/notifications` - Notifications
- `/customize` - Dashboard customization
- `/reset-password` - Password reset
- `/update-password` - Update password

## Market News
- `/market-news` - Latest news
- `/market-news/general` - General news
- `/market-news/press-releases` - Press releases

## Legal & Company
- `/privacy-policy` - Privacy policy
- `/terms-of-use` - Terms of service  
- `/data-disclaimer` - Data disclaimer
- `/imprint` - Legal imprint
- `/advertise` - Advertising
- `/affiliate-program` - Affiliate program
- `/donation` - Support us
- `/newsletter` - Newsletter signup
- `/sitemap` - Site map
